message.runner.description:
&fRun to the center of the map as fas as you can. But beware,
&fThe border is chasing you. Get there first to get a
&fbonus and kill all the survivors.
message.preparation: &7You have &b15 seconds &7to prepare for the start!
message.border-shrink: &7The border starts to &cshrink&7! Run quickly to &bthe center &7of the map!
message.border-end: &bThe border &7arrived at the center. &cPvP &7will be enabled in &c5 seconds&7!
message.bonus-selected: %player% &7reached &bthe center &7in &6first position&7! He selected the bonus: &b%bonus%&7!
gui.bonus.name: &8Arrived bonus
gui.challenge.name: &8Challenge: &b%challenge%
bonus.nothing.name: &cNothing
bonus.sword.name: Diamond sword
bonus.armor.name: Diamond armor
bonus.damage-potions.name: Damage potions
bonus.heal-potions.name: Heal potions
bonus.lava.name: Lava
bonus.rod.name: Fishing rod
challenge.none.item.name: &cNo challenge
challenge.difficulty.item.name: &aDifficulty: %difficulty%
challenge.random.item.name: &eRandom Challenge
challenge.favorites.item.name: &6Favorites
challenge.first.name: First
challenge.first.lore:
&7Be the first to arrive at the
center to succeed this challenge.
challenge.warrior.name: Warrior
challenge.warrior.lore:
&7Do not take any arrival bonus
&7and kill all the players to
&7succeed in this challenge.
challenge.serial-killer.name: Serial killer
challenge.serial-killer.lore:
&7Kill all the players in the
&7game to succeed in this challenge.
challenge.no-block-placed.name: Thrifty
challenge.no-block-placed.lore:
&7Do not use more than 16 blocks
&7during the running phase to
&7succeed in this challenge.
challenge.fast-arrived.name: Usain Bolt
challenge.fast-arrived.lore:
&7Get to the center in less than
&7&73m10s to succeed in this challenge.
challenge.last.name: Latecomer
challenge.last.lore:
&7Get to the center in last
&7position to succeed in this
&7challenge.
challenge.survivor.name: Survivor
challenge.survivor.lore:
&7Get to the center without
&7having taken any damage to
&7succeed this challenge.
host.category.runner-main.name: &bTheRunner
host.category.runner-border.name: &bBorder
host.option.bonus.name: &bBonus
host.option.bonus.description:
&7Set whether first position
&7bonus is enabled or not.
host.option.invincibility.name: &bInvincibility
host.option.invincibility.description:
&7Set whether players will be
&7invincible during run phase.
host.option.food.name: &bFood uses
host.option.food.description:
&7Set whether players will have
&7to eat food.
host.option.game-time.name: &bGame time
host.option.game-time.description:
&7Set the maximum of time the
&7game will last.
host.option.inventory.name: &bInventory &8(Starting)
